title: Mass Effect Cheat engine Fix
description:
Well alt+tab to windows was not somthing i whanted to do
since i could not get back in again (maybe if i waited long enough)
so i used the generate trainer option in cheat engine and created
a simple trainer.

Useage:
start trainer (MEGMFIX.exe)
Start Masseffect
at main menu before doing anything press
ctrl+alt+numpad9
load game

also contains all the orignial files

BY GNIARF @2491 - http://www.rlslog.net/mass-effect-detonation/comment-page-25/#comments
